info.hidden: Page is not shown in Navigation Menu.

ur_page.tip:
Multi Page creates pseudo pages in Unified-RED to simplify creating pages with identical groups, tabs, & widgets. A Multi page requires:
  • Instance Name Expression: must include {x} (variable). In the generated pseudo pages, the {x} shall be replaced by each instance name of the matching instance parameter.
  • Instance Names: The list (comma separated and/or range) of user defined names that will replace {x} in the Instance Name Expression to form instance display names.
  • Instance Parameters: The list of variable-values pairs that are used as instance identifiers and as topic (e.g., MQTT) substitution variables.
    • Variable: User-defined keywords that are used to identify substitutable parts of the message topic. (e.g. 'glp/0/17qdcee/fb/dev/lon/siot-1/if/WebServer/{ws}/nvoStatus_{index}' where ws and index are variables). Please NOTE: variable names must match exactly between instances and the topic pattern of the individual widgets that are a part of the multi page.
    • Values: Expected values (alpha-numeric) that will appear in the message topics (in place of the variable). Please NOTE: the number of values must match the number of Instance Names.
